subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: ghost box hacks
author: Frank Sumption

I think you'll find the C2C staff not as interested as they would like us =
to believe.
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: michaelcoletta@ya=
hoo.comDate: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 03:04:45 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: ghost box=
 hacks




I wrote to all the c2c people this morning about the 12-469 and =
12-470. I wrote to George, Art, Ian, and Rollye James. Only Rollye James wr=
ote back so far thanking me for the information. That was nice of her!- Mik=
e--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" <Ticket_to_Heaven@...>=
 wrote:>> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> =
wrote:> >> > > > The hack is of the bag, it's out there on the web. Only a =
friggin' moron would think a few mean words can stop it. I say, tell all ou=
r friends about the hacks, the Mini box, my boxes, and all ITC communcation=
 methods. I'd be on the radio tonight if I could. > > > > Frank-S> > > > > =
> To: EVP-ITC@: ghostchasingfool@: Sat, 1 Dec 2007 17:28:43 -0800Subject: R=
e: [EVP-ITC] ghost box hacks> > > > > > > > > > I am so sorry all of you ar=
e going through this. Your in our thoughts and prayers! You are all doing p=
ositive things and they will prevail!Sumra Dume <duck@> wrote: > > > > > > =
Colleagues,Thank you for your concern. Events that unfolded early this morn=
ing have prompted me to effectively close the Ghostboxhacks site for the ne=
ar term. Do to the nature of these events it is inappropriate to discuss th=
e matter in a public form such as this. Please do not speculate on the natu=
re of this event. I am sorry, after talking to council I removed my stateme=
nt from Ghostboxhacks.I don't want to fuel wild speculation. I wish I could=
 go in to greater detail, at this time I have been advised not to.Thank you=
, Everyone for your emails and concern.-Sum> > > > The contents of this ele=
tronic correspondence is private & confidential and meant only for the part=
y and/or parties it is addressed to. > > > > No part of this email transmis=
sion may be publicly posted or forwarded to other parties without explicit =
written permission.> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > ________________________=
__________________________________> > Connect and share in new ways with Wi=
ndows Live.> > http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wav=
e2_newways_112007> >> =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =
=3D =3D =3D Hi Frank & All, Well, we ALL could email C2C's George Noorey an=
d tell him about the RS 12-469 Am/FM radio hacks and how to work it . . . .=
 IF he mentions it on the show, IMAGINE, the results! Plus, RS would possib=
ly get sold out of those radios. Kinda like the now discontinued Panasonic =
RR DR-60 IC recorder + potentially increase in value! Why not even post a M=
odified RS 12-469 on EBAY and see what happens!? Let's advertise what we've=
 discovered, here! =3DJudy=3D> 






_____________________________________=
____________________________
Your smile counts. The more smiles you share, =
the more we donate.=A0 Join in.
www.windowslive.com/smile?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_=
Wave2_oprsmilewlhmtagline
--_a7eded6c-321b-409b-b7be-bdbc1229d80a_
